categories: Category:Star Wars: The Han Solo Trilogy

nodes.text: The Han Solo Trilogy is a Star Wars Legends hardcover compendium title collecting the three volumes of author A. C. Crispin's Star Wars: The Han Solo Trilogy from publisher Bantam Spectra: The Paradise Snare, The Hutt Gambit, and Rebel Dawn. The compendium was originally released as part of the subscription-based Science Fiction Book Club in 1998. Retailer Barnes & Noble released an exclusive leather-bound Collectible Edition of The Han Solo Trilogy on October 20, 2017.
